properties.entry: SELECT /* $reportUser.userName */ /*+label($!reportMetadata.environment$$!reportMetadata.reportType$$!reportMetadata.reportName$$!dim)*/ s.name ||(CASE WHEN t.external_name IS NULL OR t.external_name = s.name THEN '' ELSE ' (' ||t.external_name|| ')' END) AS site, SUM(f.ads_served) AS adServed, SUM(f.ads_delivered) AS adDelivered, SUM(f.price_sum) AS grossAcquisitionCostInCpm, SUM(f.revenue) AS netAcquisitionCost FROM fact_exchange_wins f INNER JOIN dim_tag t ON t.id = f.tag_id INNER JOIN dim_site s ON s.id = t.site_id WHERE f.start >= :start AND f.start < :stop GROUP BY f.site_id, s.name, t.external_name
